title: Seva List & Booking
desc: Experience spiritual bliss by booking your preferred sevas at the Hanuman Temple. From daily Archana to special Utsavams, participate in sacred rituals, offer prayers, and receive divine blessings. Limited slots available — book your seva now!
addressText: 123 Divine Street, Peace Nagar, Bliss City, India – 123456

newsEvent.title: Hanuman Jayanti 2025
newsEvent.description1: Join us in celebrating the birth of Lord Hanuman, a day of devotion and spiritual rejuvenation.
newsEvent.description2: Participate in the recitation of the Hanuman Chalisa, Ramayana, and offer prayers for strength and protection.
newsEvent.description3: Enjoy prasad and community feasts as we come together in faith and unity.
newsEvent.stayTuned: Stay tuned for more exciting updates and events!

templeHistory.title: History of the Temple
templeHistory.paragraph1: Hanuman is the very embodiment of Bhakti, “The Bhakta of Bhaktas”. His adoration of the incarnate divinity of Rama is absolute. A very popular god among both rural and urban devotees, he is worshiped for various benefits: health, wealth, happiness, fulfillment of desires, success, and magical accomplishments.
templeHistory.paragraph2: The history behind the name of the temple is as fascinating as Hanuman's Leelas. It is believed that a big heap of Ragi (a food grain) turned into stone, hence the name “Ragigudda”. The temple was constructed in 1969 and has since evolved into a grand complex.
